@schmutzie @JustDrawnRadio Thank you for the tip! Reaching out.

@JustDrawnRadio Hello I'm Alisha from CBC News in Toronto. I've been forwarded your name. Is it true you were stuck in an elevator because of the power outages? Would you be willing to speak with us? Please email: alisha.parchment@cbc.ca
@thefunkygirl I hope so too!

@schmutzie We are hoping to speak with residents who are still without power, would you be interested in joining us for a live television interview? To tell us what these past few hours have been like? Please email: alisha.parchment@cbc.ca
@schmutzie Hello, I'm Alisha from CBC News. Has your power been restored yet? How are you doing?
@thefunkygirl Hello, how are you doing? I'm Alisha with CBC News in Toronto. Has your power been restored yet?
@prairiesundance Hello, I'm Alisha with CBC News in Toronto. How are you doing? Has your power come back on yet?
